item.title: Pixel 10 phones and Switch 2 games round out this week’s best deals
item.description: If you’re taking it easy during the slow, in-between week between Christmas and New Year’s, now’s a good time to catch up on deals you might’ve missed. Many of our favorite discounts from the past week are still hanging around, making this an especially convenient moment to shop. Whether you’re eyeing a new phone, gearing […]

item.title: Xbox can’t wait to get out of 2025 and start talking about the next generation
item.description: Microsoft priced itself out of the console market and started talking up the next generation.

item.title: Your full software kit for ditching Big Tech in 2026
NY Governor Hochul signs bill requiring warning labels on ‘addictive’ social media
item.description: New York Governor Kathy Hochul signed a bill requiring social media platforms to show warning labels to younger users before they’re exposed to features such as autoplay and infinite scrolling.

item.title: ‘Ben 10’ Was, First and Foremost, for Kids—and Also for Itself
item.description: The 20-year-old Cartoon Network franchise never lost sight of the childlike joy that comes with being a superhero.

item.title: I tried to build a $550 rig to beat this $379 Machenike Ryzen 7 8745HS Mini PC — and I was unsuccessful
item.description: No other deal touches this Machenike AI mini PC for value - and it boasts an AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS with 16GB of high-speed RAM and a 512GB M.2 SSD.

item.title: Test du Hisense 55E7Q Pro : un téléviseur QLED 144 Hz accessible très fluide et réactif
item.description: Le Hisense 55E7Q Pro est un téléviseur QLED 4K de 55 pouces d'entrée de gamme qui vise à offrir une expérience fluide et polyvalente dans un format compact et abordable. Nous l’avons testé pour voir ce qu’il valait.

item.title: So you got a video doorbell or security camera for Christmas – what should you do now?

item.title: I'm tempted by the iPhone 17, but there are 3 reasons why I won't be upgrading just yet
